name: Bread Quest: Legend of Butter
description:
Welcome to the Bread Realms where you play as a young Breadling on a journey to defeat the Breadevil. 

The game is currently in beta stages but with a short playable prologue that can get you going and experience the taste of what Bread Quest can be.

Beta Features:                                                                           
- Trials of Heroes (Prologue)
- Bromeo and Bruliet (Side Quest)

Expect the usual bugs while play testing this beta, and feedback is not required nor is donation but it can help a lot with the early development of this game. I plan on continuing the development of this game until it is completed. A total of ten chapters have been planned with the prologue currently finished. 

If you find any bugs please comment below and it can save me some time.

"Credits to plugin creators and everyone involved will be published after first demo is completed."
